title: Lal Isuan min entir eng var takin
lyrics:
Lal Isuan min entir, eng var takin,
Khaw thima khawnvar te a eng ang bawkin;
Keini eng tur kan ni, khawvel thimah,
Nang i awmna hmunah, kei, ka hmunah.

Lal Isuan min entir, amaha tan,
Fel takin a hria, eng fiah lo mah ila;
Kan en dan a thlir thin, van atangin,
Nang i awmna hmunah, kei, ka hmunah.

Lal Isuan min entir, thenawmte tan,
Thim leh hrehawm zinga anni tihlawm nan;
Dam chhungin eng ila, khawvel thimah,
Nang i awmna hmunah, kei, ka hmunah.
